import React, {useEffect, useState} from 'react' import Platforms from '../Platforms/Platforms' import {useSelectr, useDispatch} from 'react-redux' import {LoadGenres, CleanRta, CleanFilterGames} from '../../redux/actions' import Genres from '../Genres/Genre' export const Form = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const allGenres = useSelector((state) => state.genres) useEffect(() => { dispatch(LoadGenres()) //Cargar generos al actualiar return () => { dispatch(CleanRta()) dispatch(CleanFilterGames()) } }, [dispatch]) return (
{/* --------------- */}
